resources.string: Welcome to the Development Plan Portal
Here is the information returned from the Open Data Geo Portal

Welcome to the What's Around Me? demo application.

What's Around Me? allows location based searches around important places of interest provided by open government data sets.

Have you ever seen a construction site and wondered, "What's going on over there? What are they building?" This application allows you to search for an address or take your current location and display information about the chosen area from multiple data sets.

Currently, the background process gets any development plan data within a specified radius of your location or of the location entered.
